content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing with a friend who also witnessed the exact same occurrence and we immediately were fixated by an unusual circle of white light that appeared over the mangroves. facing cairns, the light that initially we believed to be a satellite soon began performing aerial movements that we both agreed were abnormal and beyond the scope of relative physics and gravity.

coming from horizon over yarrabah and moving towards the right hand side of cairns, its trajectory angled over the south of cairns in an atmospheric curve. as it travelled its path, the light was simultaneously moving from left to right, and this motion is best described as an arc moving between a consistent 90 degree circumference.  this dual movement (forward thrust and sideways arc swing) seemed to have separate individual constant velocities. as the object moved higher above the horizon, it felt as if it was moving towards the tablelands. i can attest that this object was not flashing but swinging side to side through space whilst travelling forward. i witnessed this swinging action occur up to 12-15 times (eg. left to right = 1 swing)

on the object���s last dual movement it came to a complete and controlled halt and hovered in this position for about 10 seconds.

the object then propelled up from its stationary position to a point in space. this was a completely different trajectory and the object changed from following the trajectory of the earth/atmosphere to propelling up, out and beyond. when the object had stopped, it resembled a distant star that was almost parallel. the speed and distance that i perceived during this secondary flight phase was fluid and direct, furthermore this particular action has been most difficult to comprehend. from my perspective, this movement appeared to be calculated and precise. it seemed the object went from its stationed position to a point almost beyond our atmosphere in matter of approximately 1 second. the object stopped with precision and there was no streak, but instead the object became endlessly smaller as it travelled an uncomprehensable distance. from my observations, the object stayed in this position for approximately 4 minutes. following this, i witnessed the object flash off & on and then about 20 seconds later, it repeated this gesture. there was no more movement until the sky became cloudy and all visibility was lost. 

there was no apparent sounds coming from the object and it never changed shape through its course of travel.  it appeared to become larger only when the object came closer and this was relative to perspective and was not a growth from its original size. as it travelled its second flight phase, distance between the object and my position grew exponentially large thus its roundness was lost. it appeared as a starry light in the far away distance.

i have estimated the size of the object to be between 20 to 45 metres in diametre.

i would like to emphasise that i clearly witnessed the object as it travelled through both phases and the distance it travelled during the second phase is perplexing. for example, it looked and felt as if the object had actually travelled from earth to another solar system. bear in mind the secondary flight phase only lasted around a second, but the way the object reached the destination was extraordinary. its flight path began well within earth's stratosphere and it zoomed into space to become a star-like figure. during this occurrence, i felt as if i had witnessed the entire journey in slow-motion, but the reality was this was almost immediate. this felt unusual because no matter how much i try to recall this particular flight scenario it is impossible for me to recollect completely and understand the distance i was shown on the night. even now the event is extremely vivid but i have no concept of time versus travel for the second phase and i find it impossible to properly understand, however i do believe there is technology currently unfounded and our current scientific laws of physics and gravity are not constants.

i have attempted to give anybody that reads this report a complete, true and honest interpretation of a possible ufo sighting. if anyone else was able to witness this event i would love to hear your interpretation and comments.

a perfect round light with powerful movements, purposeful and accurate it's actions were mesmerising, but somehow belittling.
content.summary: Spherically shaped, white luminious object seen flying two separate trajectories. defied aeronautical capabilities.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 5:15am, my friend and i were standing out front of his apartment in barboursville, wv(about 5 miles from huntington, wv). he looks up and sees two lights moving north east at a steady pace. i looked up and saw the two lights start to rotate and one light move in front of the other. the lights were around 100 yards off the ground maybe more.  we could not tell if there was an object attached to the two lights. if it was an object it was rectangular in shape. the two lights became one and continued moving north east. there was no sound.
content.summary: Two lights possibly a rectangler craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside early in the morning after having saw a particularly bright star from my bedroom window as i laid in bed watching online tv.  in any event, i decided to go outside and smoke a cigarette while checking the water level in our pool (we are currently filling it up after replacing the liner).  then i saw a similar thing to what i had seen last night.  but this time, the object seemed to be much lower with another point of light connected to it.  basically, the object slowly floated towards the horizon--the east--as light was just beginning to come with the dawn.  about 20 seconds after it faded slowly into the sky (not the horizon).  also, the whole time the two objects stayed equidistant from one another.
honestly, i have no idea what the objects were.  the light was completely steady and white for the whole time--except as it dimmed.  certainly, not flashing like airplane lights though.
my reactions were basically just one of awe because i didn't expect to see something again like the anomalous object i viewed the previous night.  this time it was much more interesting though.  again, these objects moved slowly as if floating through the sky to the east as dawn was breaking.
content.summary: Two (connected) equidistant star-like ufo passes

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my family by the fire when i went into the house to let the dog outside to join us.  it was getting late, anywhere between 11-12, when from the back porch i saw a steady, white star-like object pass slowly for about 30 seconds until it finally dimmed slowly until it went out.  it was high up and only just as large as one of the stars.
i don't know what i thought at first because the object was moving to slow to be a shooting star, and too fast to be a transiting planet.  the object moved in a straight path, and seemed to be extremely high up.
content.summary: Tiny star like object

content.detailedDescription: I just saw a satellite or ufo pass the space station on the live nasa tv video during the stormm trajectory test immediately surrounding the vh burn. it traveled vertically on the video with no transverse deviations. it looked like a satellite, but it was interesting. i had the u-verse dvr recording running at the time so it is stored in the u-verse box. you should review the nasa video at this time, if you have it, at around 11:50 pm pdt.
content.summary: On the nasa live video a satellite or ufo passed th space station

content.detailedDescription:
Good friend of mine often records w pics the building of unusual structures he is involved w. project lasted sev months or more. on this day the camera cot object in air and also other unidentified thing in lft side of frame while they were wrking. no one heard or saw anything. my friend has degree n geology. i wz teacher 4 17yrs. i now do contract labor for museums writing curriculums or surveying exhibit design. we r not ufo ologists or fanatics. he is scared. i m trying to find someone to come look @ photo. will not send over internet. there is nothing else it could be. the under carriage also has door open that apparently dropped off probe or whatever. this is not a bird or insect. no lens glare. we r perplexed and need assistance. we feel it is an obligation.Less than 20 people have been shown the pic. if i do not hear frm u soon via cell phone...I am going to kus astronomy department.

my friend did not notice object until he was looking at all photos (hundreds) and then called me. interestingly i had been calling him 2 find out if planets or anything else could be attributing to the energy i wz feeling over the last couple days. i have an education degree (17 yrs of teaching) then went to get a masters @ ku in museum studies n historical administration w minor n anthropollogy. he called me over to look @ photo.

this thing looks exactly like u would think a alien spacecraft would look. it is unnerving. the probe wz let out @ the highest pt near lawrence.

i will not send a pic this way. u must contact me thru cell phone n make a connection first.
content.summary: Friend set tripod 2 take shots every 30 secs 2 record buildin of barn. during shots on ths day, it wz captured.

content.detailedDescription: I went out back of my house to smoke a cigarette, and lit 2 tiki torches. after a minute or so i got to looking up and thinking about how me and my ex used to compete at who could see more satellites or shooting stars the torches were making it hard to see so i put the one closest to me out. i kept watching the sky and finally thought i saw a shooting star, then i realized it was three lights. they were evenly spaces solid white in a triangular pattern. they were moving north to south, it's hard to guess how big it was but if i were to hold my fingers gapped 1/4 inch at an arms length that would be how big it appeared. it flew in pretty much a perfectly straight line but seemed like it swayed ever so slightly, side to side like a surfer i guess it. it was hardly noticeable. i've seen thousands of planes fly by, including military jets but this was nothing like that, there were no strobes or red/blue markers at all and there was no noise at all absolutely silent. i suppose it could be a meteor that broke into three pieces but it seems slim for it to be perfectly spaces and keep going until the lights disappeared out of view over top of crescent city to the south across the bay.
content.summary: 3 solid white lights evenly spaced fly by

content.detailedDescription: At my home in my back yard playing horse shoes i was walking south west ward lookin at the distant mountains-looking up approx 800 to 1000 ft flying sw to ne straight line moved w/o noise first huvering then moving out of sight within 45 secs to a minute. a very erie sight rotated at its center while huvering when i first observed it, it shown a white beam like light 2 or 3 times. watched it pass directly over my house. i ran into the bottom back door up the stairs and yelled at my wife to follow me outside through the front door she did and by the time i pointed to where it was it was already at the horizon of a ridge approximately 1 mile away my wife saw it as it disappeared over the ridge. the object at first appeared as a cylinder shape round on top and squared at the bottom (honestly it really reminded me of r2d2 in appearence). it was able to and did rotate at its center there were what looked like 2 single extentions at its base when i first saw it i later thought they may have been landing gear? but as it passed over the extensions were no longer visible. the object was almost translucent in its appearence kind of darker at the top and clear at its bottom half. i am a registered nurse 59 years old and an air force vet. i am familure w/ all sorts of odd looking craft being statinoed at holloman afb for the last 2 years of my enlistment. i think the oddest thing of the entire experience was that there was absolutely no noise made by this craft in fact for just a moment as it passed over head i thought it may have been some sort of weather balloon however it had structure was solid and very multi demensional in its charicter, it had left me astounded,dumbfounded and wondering if it was somthing my mind made up...But my wife saw it as well, a very out of this world experience!
content.summary: Looking up approx 800 to 1000 ft flying sw tp ne straight line moved w/o noise first huvering then moving out of sight withing 15 to 25secs. erie sight rotated at its center shown a white beam like light 2 or 3 times. watched it pass directly over my hous

content.detailedDescription: My mother was setting on the front porch when see opened the door and screamed for me to come out side and when i ran out she pointed out over the pouch banister for me to look on what she was seeing and what i was seen was a very bright low reddish in color what look to me was a fireball ball and it looked to me like it was changing shape or form in side the light if any one else has seen this object please contact me *(email address deleted-cms/sg) the question that scratches my mind is what are they??? see them here every year at this time!!!
content.summary: Seen frieball object very low to the ground polsating and very bright !!!

content.detailedDescription: Close to 35w and hennepin ave .East in minneapolis, parking my car in company parking lot.  i observed the alignment of four planets in a diagonal formation and then noticed an arrow shaped object directly above me, reflecting light from the city.  i had no idea what it was but thought it might be a kite, tethered. it occurred to me that it would have to be an enormous kite.  it did not move and looked like a giant orange arrow with the pointed shape and the shaft not connected.  it did not change direction or move.  it was orange in color and stayed there for about 45 minutes, until i had to go home. too high to be a kite unless it was one the size of a mini van.  the object had very straight edges that did not change shape.  i just felt confused, like observing an optical illusion.  it was definitely an object and not an illusion or cloud or smoke or reflection.
content.summary: Arrow shaped, like a teathered kite but way up high.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen huge triangle shape craft 3-4 hundred yards across wing tip to wing tip also saw one in what was lukens steel in late 80's early 90's .Call would love to share this with you. other sightings
content.summary: Several 4-5 wife saw 4 disc shape on 27th may

content.detailedDescription: Due to a severe storm, our power went out for approximately 10 hours starting at 530 pm. around 10 pm, i told my husband i was going to sit in the car with the a/c on as i was getting overheated. after about 10 min, while i was listening to the radio, i saw a car drive slowly by and watched the tailights disappear from sight. i watched for a little bit to see if they were slowing down or stopping. within about a minute, i saw a row of 4 lavender lights about 10 feet above the road slowly move along the road that is in front of our house. they came from the direction the car just went. our home is about 100 yards from the road but i could see the lights very clearly moving very slowly. i was not able to comprehend what they were and my mind was racing. with what i can only describe as sheer horror, i saw one light break away and slowly move down our driveway. i got out of the car and made my way inside as quickly as possible. i was in such terror i could only blubber out to my husband what i saw. he turned off his flashlight and watched out the window. we both witnessed some fireflies and he assured me that was what i saw. it was not. the lavender lights did not blink and moved very slowly in a straight horizontal line. i tried to disregard what i saw but then saw the other report of the same lights and knew i had to report it.
content.summary: Lavender lights in a row above the road

content.detailedDescription: I was told by my source that when i went to the lake that i would have an opportunity to see a visit and to look for the triangle.  the only lake that i was going to in the near future was lake elsinore for a graduation event.  around 10 pm, on may 26th, i was told by my source that it was time look for it over the lake. i was a little disappointed because the stadium lights were still on from the graduation and thought it would be difficult to see anything with so much light in the area.  i went out to call my husband and tell him about the day's celebration events and was looking across the lake at the mountains from the lake elsinore best western hotel, where i was staying.  standing next to the pool area at the hotel and looking across the lake to my right, i was able to see 2 stationary orange lights at near the top of the mountain behind the lake.  the lights were parallel to each other and about a 1/2 mile apart.   i was able to determine that these stationary lights were either house lights or lights for the airplanes, as they were identical in size, remained stationary and constant.  2 small airplanes flew by as i talked to my husband.  then, between and above the 2 lights, a third orange light came on creating a triangle, with the 2 lights on the bottom.   my guess is that it was about 200 feet above the 2 lights. the 3rd light stayed stationary above the other 2 lights and smack in the middle.  i told my husband about the 3rd light and stayed on the phone.  the 3rd light object was slightly larger than the other 2 lights and seemed to blink more than the other 2 lights.  this light stayed stationary for about 2 minutes.  i was about to dismiss it as a tower light or some other stationary light/marker, but then it started moving forward and slightly upwards about as fast as the 2 small planes i saw earlier.  then it hovered again for about 20 seconds, flashed brighter, then moved straight up quickly and blinked out.  the sky was clear and there were no clouds.  i waited a few more minutes, saw another plane and went inside.   the next morning i went out and looked at the same area where the lights appeared.  the 2 bottom orange lights most likely came from the higher points of near the top of the mountain.  the place that the 3rd light appeared would have been above  a crevice between the 2 points.  i checked my phone and i called my husband that night at 10:12 pm and the call was 5 minutes and 3 seconds.  i was on the phone about a minute before the 3rd light appeared and about a minute after it blinked out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange light hovering and moving by lake elsinore

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my moms car to school no wind was about and no storm.There was a car in front of us and a huge spot light shined on it. i looked up and i see, about 40 to 50 feet in the air,what looked like a decommissioned black bird airplane hovering. it slowly moved to the power lines and they started shaking. then a blinding light and the plane was gone.No one was able to see it i believe, i was shocked no one believed me for a while.
content.summary: Made a bunch or wind and a spotlight. 40 feet above ground

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were at another friends house, relaxing on the front porch. we were talking when i looked out over the treeline and saw two red/red-orange lights relatively close to us. my first thought was that they were the lights on the wingtips of a plane and that a plane was coming in for a crash landing. however there was no sound of an engine, in fact there was no sound coming from the objects at all. then the two lights started weaving towards and away from each other. they changed directions rapidly and appeared to bob around in the sky.

they were like orbs and appeared to be lit from the inside at the bottom. the bottom was like a bright red-orange and lit the entire object to a red color.

perplexed, we moved to the porch rail to get a better look; they started moving to our left. my friend called out to our other friends father who was right inside in the living room. he came out to view it with us. shortly after he came out a third object of the same type came out over the treeline. it followed the same path as the previous two; first moving towards us and then to the left before it changed directions again to fly off. as they began to fly off we found a pair of binoculars to try and get a better look, however by then they were too far away. they flew off and then flickered out of sight.
content.summary: Three red objects appear over the treeline then change direction and fly away. made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my car looked into blue sky south east and saw a long white object cigar shaped had no noise at all took some photo with my digital camera it changed into a saturn looking shape and then it disappeared..I thouht i blank photos until i put them on my computer.   it sure was flying fast.  i have photos.
content.summary: White solid object no noise..About over the crawford ranch

content.detailedDescription:
I had an experience that took me out of body, not a sighting.

just before i went inside to go to bed i was looking at the stars, it was a clear night and the sky was full of stars. i started to concentrate on a small star overhead then i went to bed. lying there i still was thinking obout this star. somthing began to happen, i started to loose feeling in my entire body and it felt relaxing. after about a half an hour i found myself awake and inside somthing that had a checked floor that was glowing and there was a semi sphirical with rabbit ear antenna. i thought i was dreaming so i moved forward toward it and it came at me i then became startaled and tried to wake up but i could not. i started to fight to wake up and it was though i was paralized and the my bed felt as though it was spinning. i finnaly was back in my body.

i have neve told anyone about this until now nor have i ever had such an expierince since. i don't mess with things i don't understand any more. this was not a dream i had no body but i could move at will.

thank you and you can take this story for what it is worth and you can belive it or not but i know what happened.
content.summary: Taken out of body

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting is being reported by investigator beverly trout for the witness, [witness name removed/cms/tg].  

on may 23, 2011, at 1:30 a.M., a female witness, in bed on their 2nd floor with her husband, awakened to the excited barking of one (1) of their three (3) dogs.  her husband, who did not get out of bed, said, ���������oh, i forgot to lower the shades,��������� meaning, the window shades in the sun-porch-like room on the lower level of their 2-storey house where the three (3) dogs are always penned in at night.  (they have cats, but the cats were shut into a spare bedroom on the 2nd floor of the house, so there was no opportunity for excitable interaction between the dogs on the first floor and the cats on the 2nd floor.)

the witness says it was perhaps 10 seconds after the dog started barking before she got out of bed.   her husband stayed in bed as the female witness looked out their 2nd storey bedroom window and saw a tiny, white. silent light (twice the brilliance of a firefly) moving along their front yard fenceline in the direction of their neighbor���������s home some 100 feet on along the road.  (witness thought the light was on the outside of the fence, but says she can���������t be totally sure it wasn���������t on the inside of the fence; she believes it definitely was not in the roadway.)  it should be noted that this is a dead-end road so traffic is minimal, and that the light was moving away from the dead-end, rather than toward it.

witness observed that this tiny white light always stayed level at about two (2) feet above the ground, and always moved at a steady unwavering horizontal pace, with no zigzagging  or side-to-side motion.  she also observed that the light switched on and off in a regular rhythm.  she was reminded of her husband���������s electric toothbrush light, which switches on and off in its charging rhythm.  witness indicates that the light seemed mechanical, and her estimate is that the on-off intervals were a bit longer than one second; she actually estimates 7-8 per 10 seconds.  this figures out to 17 to 20 times during the 25 seconds she believes she had the light in sight.  (it should be noted that no fireflies have yet been seen in that area, nor would be expected this early in the season in the state of iowa.)

witness was surprised to observe no illumination from this light.   (it should be noted that there are no security yard lights in this area, and witness indicates total darkness.)  she was also surprised that only one (1) dog excitedly barked, since the usual pattern is for all three (3) dogs to chime in when one of them gets excited.  witness also notes that the dog which barked is the ���������smarter��������� of their three dogs.  

distance from the witness��������� vantage point to about mid-way along the front yard fenceline where she first saw the light moving, is approximately 40 feet. witness observed movement of this light for a land distance of some 40 feet, that is, from mid-yard fenceline to just past the driveway gate area where she lost sight of this tiny white light as it made its way on toward the neighbor���������s house, and was obscured by vegetation.

as stated above, she estimates that the light was moving so slowly that she had it in sight for about 25 seconds, in other words that it moved a bit over 1 ��������� feet per second, which figures out to a bit over one (1) mile per hour.

her husband indicates that if his wife had thought to tell him right away that the light did not illuminate, he would have probably gotten out of bed to look out the window, also.

witness says she was looking out at total darkness.  since the moon was only 5 degrees altitude at 107 degrees azimuth, the moon apparently shed no appreciable light on the area of this sighting.

witness checked the time as 1:30 a.M. just before she went to the window and saw the light, but says she did not check the time when the incident was over.

witness has excellent distance vision, and so wears no glasses except for reading purposes.  

investigator trout called the local police department and was told they had received no other reports in the area.

[[[investigator���������s note:  it should be noted that this family moved to iowa from another state in the fall of 2010, and that investigator trout has known this family and has had a sense of their credibility for some ten years.  it should also be noted that family members have a history of abduction, that is, two adult children, as well as at least one of the parents.  they have no wish to have their identity known.  some years ago, one of the parents underwent a rather traumatic hypnosis session with a well-known hypnotherapist, (who frequently speaks in public), and has never had a wish to pursue any further probing into the abduction experiences.  whether the current report indicates any connection with the family abduction history, of course, is not known; it simply deserves to be mentioned here.
content.summary: Tiny white silent slow moving light approximately 40 feet from witness moving horizontal 2 feet off ground & rhythmically switching on-off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to a food center on waukegan and deerfield rd, and i noticed these two strange red lights in the sky. they did not exhibit strobe patterns like your typical airplane at
night. when i finally arrived at the food center and walked outside the lot,
i noticed more of the same objects coming from one particular area, and that
was in the direction of lake michigan. some of them were bright solid red or
yellow and they were consistently lit. i began filming since there were so
many of them coming in fairly quick succession. all of them appeared to be
heading the same way and then they would eventually vanish quickly at a
particular point. they were very silent, and i could not hear the sound of
jet engines. they were at an appropriate distance to hear engine noise if
they were indeed airplanes. eventually no more objects came to follow.

 in the film i took, the objects appear to be blinking, but that's not how it
was when i was there. 38 seconds in to the video you'll notice glare, which is not to be
mistaken for something else. the video can be seen at:

*(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Circular non-blinking objects glowing orange and yellow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at about 1:00am and was stopped and looking up at the sky.  i noticed two orange objects moving across the sky about the speed of a fast satellite.  they were not very bright and there were some thin clouds above.  after a a few seconds one appeared to veer off at almost a right angle.  then both disappeared.

i noticed them because of the movement and the fact that they were different than any shooting star i have seen before.  when i first noticed the two they reminded me of satellites because of the speed.  they were bigger than a star.  when one veered off that was something i had never seen before.

i felt that i had seen something unusual.  i looked on the internet and saw similar reports about fast moving orange objects--wow.  so what were they?
content.summary: Two orange objects moving quickly then one veered off and both disappeared

content.detailedDescription: i had just dropped of my mother and my aunt at the front of this grocery store and went to park my rental car at an area in the parking lot that was slightly higher so that way i could get a better view of when my relatives come out of the grocery store and are ready to be picked up , since i was on an emergency visit and did'nt know how much time i would be staying for i called an old friend to come meet me for a bit while i waited , when my good friend arrived he and his cousin greeted me outside between our cars , they were talking and suddenly i noticed a shape up in the clouds i could not believe what i was seeing ... it was a large disc , i could not stop from watching this disc ,i was trying in my head to come up with an excuse to what it was'nt but i knew it was not a ballon , because it would be floting away , this disc just stood very still , part of it i would say less than half was in the cloud , i wanted to reach out to my friends and have them look up but as i was about to do so the disc began to move perfectly straight up until it was so small it disapeared ! i remember it was a flat silver or grey disc, as soon as it was gone i asked my friends if they saw it , then we stood there talking about it while looking up in case the disk returned . i will never forget !
content.summary: Saw a large disc in the clouds  just right above me , noticed it while i was standing out side a grocery parking lot while i was talking to some friends .

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work, and was stopped at a stop sign. the area is very rural on top of a mountain. i noticed out of the left field of my vision a set of 3-4 lavender colored lights set in a horizontal row move towards the middle of my field of vision. these lights were moving slowly and caught my attention because of their strange color. as i drove forward, coming upon the crest of the hill, wherein there is a large field on both sides of the road, i noticed a similiar configuration of lights enter the right side of my field of vision. they were orange-red in color. i looked for indications the lights could be shining up in the sky from the ground, but the area is so rural it seemed unlikely. the lights were also very high up in the sky indication an aircraft of some sort. there were also no trails of light from the ground up that you would usually see from a spot light or laser. i was convinced at that point these lights belonged to an aircraft. as the lights on the right proceeded to fly towards the lights on the left side of the sky, they changed from the orange redish color to the lavender observed on the left side of the sky lights. i slowed and watched the lights begin to circle one another. the right hand side lights moving from being in a horizontal line with the left side lights to swiftly hovering above them in a vertical manner. the lights then began to circle around each other. at this point i was baffled as to what type of aircraft these can be since i have never witnessed these manuvers nor the colors. at that moment i was convinced they were a ufo of some sort and began to feel a bit frightened. i started to drive faster down the road keeping an eye on the lights in my perpihel vision. after watching them circle around each other at a faster rate they disappeared.
this occured at 10:18 pm est on second hill rd in new milford ct.
content.summary: Lavender horizontal line of lights in sky/ new milford ct 5/28/11 10:18pm est

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving to my house in a town called port republic, nj. (small town) my boyfriend noticed first and i noticed about two seconds afterwards. it was a bright red glowing object in the sky. it was really bright and there were no flashing lights like a plane or anything like that. i hit the brakes to get a better look and try to get a picture but just as i did that the object stopped glowing so bright and became a dull red dot. then took off and disappeared behind the tree line. i couldn't quite tell how high up in the sky it was. i'd say it was higher up than a plane, but my boyfriend thinks it was lower. he did see it first. i was truly freaked by this.
content.summary: Bright red glowing object in the sky that dimmed and flew away quickly

content.detailedDescription: At around 10:15 pm my family and i were coming home from a very late dinner and were pulling into our driveway/parking area.  the lot was full so i decided to drop everyone off and circle around the neighborhood (one way streets) and park in front of the house.  while i was circling around the neighborhood i looked up in the sky and saw 3 lights in a perfect triangle with a red light in the middle.  these lights were not super high but not too low and were coasting over the neighborhood.  to make this even more amazing the craft made absolutely no sound.  when i saw this i was very excited and in a way couldn't believe that i was finally lucky enough to see something like this.  i started to follow the lights in my car but eventually the streets didn't match up with the path that the lights were traveling.  when i finally got to a clearing where i had a better view of the sky the lights were gone.
content.summary: Triangle ufo slowly moving over salem mass

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for a smoke at approximately 3:25 p.M. i was sky-gazing; merely looking at clouds. when i was done with the cigarette, i looked up at a 45 degree angle toward the north west sky, i noticed an object hovering. it was completely still, despite it being very windy at that moment. i observed it hovering in the blue sky for approximately a minute and half until a dark cloud passed under it, and it was gone. i waited for the cloud to move, and it was no longer there. after that i stayed out for another 10 minutes to see if it had perhaps moved to a different location, which it had not.

once i noticed the object, i pulled out my phone to record it. when i finally went inside, i uploaded it to my computer to review the video, but the phones camera didn't seem to have picked it up.

if it makes a difference, i had been outside all day until then, and the air traffic was very light, despite it being memorial day weekend. 

the weather was partly cloudy and windy, with maybe 50% of the sky having scattered clouds.

i have extensive knowledge of aircraft, military and commercial, as well knowledge of air traffic patterns in the area.
content.summary: Black sphere hovered in sky until obscured by clouds

content.detailedDescription:
It was a few days before christmas.It was a chilly night, clear and no moon visable @ the time. i lived in an basement apartment that had a seperate entrance that opened to the backyard with stairs leading up out of the basement.I smoke and go outside to do so. on this particular night i was standing towards the top step smoking. it was a clear night and on clear nights i often try to find the constelations orion and the big dipper .I was facing north and to my right i thought i saw orion (east), but somthing seemed off about it.I hadnt had the chance to look at the night sky for a while (due to overcast skys or not being out after dark)
usually it seems like orion is usually upright or close to it but it was
on it's side this night.I thought this is maybe just how it appears in the sky at this time of year so i looked around at the other stars to see if orion was somwhere else in the sky and i was mistaken at what i first thought was orion.As i looked back and forth something about the "sideways orion" in the east caugth my eye i percieved movment but could not locate it at first. then i began to focuse and was looking at what would be the 3 stars that make up the belt of orion. remember it was on it's side from my point of view. like if you saw it perfectly upright and someone turned it 90 degrees to the left.So the bottom star of the belt is farthest to the left from my viewpoint.The movement was slow and incredibly fluid all three stars of the belt where moving at the exact same speed but with slightly different trajectory's. the lowest star was moving almost in a perfcet horizontal way from right to left.The other two stars where moving both down and right to left on a course that would intercept the position that the first star(lowest)was moving. then the first(lowest) star just vanished as if it was just turned off .Then the next highest star reached the position where the first star dissappered and it also "just turned off" .Then the third star did the exact same.
i was stunned and scared i could not understand what i had just seen and i wished so bad that someone had witnessed it.I felt immediatly the need to tell someone.But knew how crazy it would sound. it was as if everything i knew was turned on it's head. i have always thougt it would be great to see something like that so you would have an answer to whether or not ufo stories where real.Despite all the stories and videos i thought that seeing would be believing, but it did not feel great it was terrifying.Also it didnt answer any questions for me but raised more.
this part may sound strange but about 20 minutes after. the whole time i was freaked out and kept asking myself what the hell did i just see? then an incredibly euphoric feeling came over me, a palpible energy and excitment that i still can not explain it was the exact opposite of what i was feeling minutes earlier. a few days later as i was thinking about it i knew what i saw,but thought well that wasnt orion ,but was it somthing mimicking orion? on christmas eve i told my duaghter and future son in law. at a family get toghether on new years eve i took my daughter and her fiance outside to show them where in the sky i saw it.As i was showing them i was startled to realize that it actaully was orion.I am not an astronomer but i 99.9 percent positve it was the orion constellation i was watching that night of the incident. i was not drinking nor do i use drugs, and as far as i know i am not crazy.This was not a comet or meteor the speed was way to slow , also i live underneath the flightpath of an international airpot and just 5 miles from an appache reserve airbase, and next to that is a small craft airport.I know what these aircraft look like in the night sky, and they do not explain what i saw.

p.S. since then i have had one other experience earily similar, yet different this time with a witness for half the event. i will make a reoprt when i have time as it may be connected to what i saw.
content.summary: Stars slowly moving to a single point then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard scanning the skies as i usually do when i noticed a small dull blue orb traveling high in the eastern sky. it traveled to the southeast until losing sight of it. i then looked to the south and noticed another orb amber orange in color traveling to the extreme south. there was a small airplane above the object traveling west. the plane turned out being a pretty good gauge of the objects position and size.
i watched the object until it disappeared below the southern horizon.
activity in this area has been pretty low recently but it appears it's ramping up again.
content.summary: Double sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work pulling a early morning shift. it was still quite dark out. i was traveling south on hwy 95 in bullhead city arizona. a light amber colored orb caught my eye to the east. it was moving quite slow in a east north east trajectory. it continued over the black mountains range until it was out of sight. i called my wife and told her about the event and asked if she would go outside and look to the west to see if she would be able to see the object from her position which is in golden valley hoping to see it appear on the other side of the mountains from her position. she was unable to spot the object.
content.summary: Hwy 95, colorado river valley

content.detailedDescription: Looking south from residence toward the intersection of s. simms and belleview; small metallic disk approximately 1000 ft agl performed a counter-clockwise  turn from east to west (180 degrees in my direction) approximately 5 seconds in duration then invisible; 15-30 seconds later in same spot, a black object flying like a bird appeared and performed roughly the same manuver but then dove, straight down until at maximum visibility i could see the object was not a bird but rather a sold, dark colored object in the shape of downward facing horse head; approximate size; 3-5'; peace among the peoples of earth in our age of ascension...
content.summary: No bird dives like that...

content.detailedDescription:
At around 8:20pm my wife suggested that we go in the backyard with our lawn chairs and relax. she chose a spot that was facing west and after settling down a bright object caught my eye. i immediately drew her attention to what i was seeing. at first you would say it was venus but venus it not up at that time. the object appeared out of nowhere. we then realized that this was something unusual. venus is a good gauge as to it's intensity and size. 
the object then began to pulsate rather quickly going from brighter to quite dim. a blue hue was also present.
finally the object flickered out again to a blue hue becoming a small dull blue color and then disappearing. it was quite amazing considering the event lasted about maybe 30 seconds.
the rest of the night was uneventful.
content.summary: It wasn't venus
